alert.note: Alert for Custer (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:14PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Custer County through 700 PM MDT... At 612 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking the development of strong thunderstorms in the Miles City area. The storms are moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. Heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor street flooding may occur. Locations impacted include... Miles City, Twelve Mile Dam, Strawberry Hill Recreation Area and Matthews Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
